Reef Doctor Internal Network

Web Sites

  • www.rd - Information about Reef Doctor
  • files.rd - Useful files including the all Reef Doctor presentations, useful software and the sustainable living (SL) data templates.
  • data.rd - Aquaculture and Science data
  • maps.rd - Satellite map of the Bay of Ranobe, including dive sites and fishing grounds
  • upload.rd - The place to upload complete SL data worksheets

Cached Map Tiles

The cached maps tiles used in maps.rd are also available for use in other applications such as QGIS. The can be accessed using the following URL.

http://maps.rd/tiles/OSM_sat_tiles/{z}/{y}/{x}.png

An example tile is http://maps.rd/tiles/OSM_sat_tiles/17/81396/74197.png

QGIS

To use the map tiles in QGIS:

  1. open QGIS
  2. in the Browser Panel, right-click on Tile Server (XYZ) and select New Connection...
  3. past the tile URL http://maps.rd/tiles/OSM_sat_tiles/{z}/{y}/{x}.png into the dialog and click OK
  4. give the server a name (can be whatever you want) and click OK
  5. Your newly created connection should appear under Tile Server (XYZ)

You can now use the maps in your mapping projects by either double clicking your created connection, or right clicking on it and selecting Add Layer
